pages.text: It seems that the hibernation base has built quite a bit, and although it has led to my current difficult situation, I have at least survived. $(br) To be honest, I always feel that this plan is a little unreliable...

$(l)$(1) Hibernation Base Construction Goes Well, Will Provide More Hibernation Services/$$(br) $(l) Losted Hope News /$To combat the effects caused by the zombie tide, most research institutes have begun to look for ways to freeze and hibernate some researchers to send them to a potentially safer future. Building a hibernation base is not a simple project,
